text: Vampire Circus is a 1972 British Hammer horror movie directed by Robert Young and starring Adrienne Corri, Thorley Walters, Anthony Higgins, John Moulder- Brown, Lynne Frederick, Lalla Ward, Robin Sachs. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 horror movies Category:British horror movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Young Category:Movies set in Austria Category:Movies set in Serbia Category:Movies set in castles Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies about entertainers Category:Vampires in movies Category:1970s monster movies
title: Vampire Circus
